name: Libre Tower
description:
Libre Tower is a project to make a free, open-sourced Pizza Tower styled platformer game in the same engine.

This game is in development, and is essentially far from completion. However, if you would like to contribute to the project with things like art, music, code, etc, you can find the two essential GitHub repositories for the project here:

https://github.com/Applemunch/LibreTower - Game source code
https://github.com/Applemunch/LibreTower-Assets - Raw asset files (.ase, .mmpz, etc)
